Articles.Content:
I don't know if there is a such mod already developed that does what I want. So I'd be happy to know where to find it if it exists.

Basically, I'm looking for a mod that allows me to adjust the lighting of VAB/SPH. Specifically, make the VAB/SPH as dark as space in order to see how the craft would look like in space.

This would be mainly to adjust various lights on the spacecraft for the best look and functionality.
